10 void filterCloud(const CloudPtr& cloud, CloudPtr& filtered_cloud)
11 {
12  CloudPtr cloud_nan(new PointCloud);
13 
14 // pcl::CropBox<PointT> crop;
15 // crop.setInputCloud(cloud);
16 // Eigen::Vector4f min;
17 // min<<boundary[0] ,boundary[2],boundary[4],1;
18 // Eigen::Vector4f max;
19 // max<<boundary[1] ,boundary[3],boundary[5],1;
20 // crop.setMin(min);
21 // crop.setMax(max);
22 // crop.filter(*cloud_nan);
23  std::vector<int> indices;
24  for(size_t i=0;i<cloud->points.size();++i)
25  {
26  if(cloud->points[i].x > boundary[0] && cloud->points[i].x < boundary[1] )
27  {
28  if(cloud->points[i].y > boundary[2] && cloud->points[i].y < boundary[3] )
29  {
30  if(cloud->points[i].z > boundary[4] && cloud->points[i].z < boundary[5] )
31  {
32  filtered_cloud->points.push_back(cloud->points[i]);
33  }
34  }
35  }
36  }
37 
38  //pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*cloud_nan, *filtered_cloud, indices);
39 }

41 void getConvexHull(const CloudPtr& cloud, CloudPtr& hull_cloud)
42 {
43  pcl::ConvexHull<pcl::PointXYZRGB> chull;
44  chull.setInputCloud (cloud);
45  chull.reconstruct (*hull_cloud);
46 }
47 
48 void projectToZ(const CloudPtr& cloud_in, CloudPtr& output_cloud)
49 {
50 
51  double val_x = cloud_in->points.at(0).x;
52  double val_y = cloud_in->points.at(0).y;
53  double val_z = cloud_in->points.at(0).z;
54  double x_max = val_x, x_min = val_x, y_max = val_y, y_min = val_y, z_max = val_z, z_min = val_z;
55  for(int i=0;i<cloud_in->points.size();++i)
56  {
57  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).x>=x_max)
58  x_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).x;
59  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).x<=x_min)
60  x_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).x;
61  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).y>=y_max)
62  y_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).y;
63  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).y<=y_min)
64  y_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).y;
65  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).z>=z_max)
66  z_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).z;
67  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).z<=z_min)
68  z_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).z;
69  }
70 
71 
72 
73  for(size_t i=0;i<cloud_in->points.size();++i)
74  {
75  pcl::PointXYZRGB p;
76  p.x = x_min;
77  p.y = cloud_in->points[i].y;
78  p.z = cloud_in->points[i].z;
79  p.rgb = cloud_in->points[i].rgb;
80  output_cloud->points.push_back(p);
81  }
82  output_cloud->header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
83  output_cloud->height = 1;
84  output_cloud->width = output_cloud->points.size();
85 }
86 
87 void cloud_cb(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstPtr& input)
88 {
89  Segmentation::Parameters params;
90  params.zmin = 0.03;
91  params.zmax = 2.0;
92  params.th_points = 200;
93  params.voxel_resolution = 0.0075f;
94  params.seed_resolution = 0.015f;
95  params.color_importance = 0.0f;
96  params.spatial_importance = 1.0f;
97  params.normal_importance = 4.0f;
98  params.use_extended_convexity = false;
99  params.use_sanity_criterion = true;
100  params.concavity_tolerance_threshold = 10;
101  params.smoothness_threshold = 0.1f;
102  params.min_segment_size = 3;
103 
104  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr input_cloud_pcl(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
105  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr filtered_cloud_pcl(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
106  pcl::fromROSMsg(*input, *input_cloud_pcl);
107  filterCloud(input_cloud_pcl, filtered_cloud_pcl);
108 
109 
110  std::cout<<"Size of input cloud: "<<input_cloud_pcl->points.size()<<std::endl;
111  std::cout<<"Size of filtered cloud: "<<filtered_cloud_pcl->points.size()<<std::endl;
112 
113  Segmentation* seg = new Segmentation(filtered_cloud_pcl, params);
114  seg->segment();
115 
116  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
117  seg->getTablecloud(table_cloud);
118  std::cout<<"Size of table cloud: "<<table_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
119  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 table_cloud_ros;
120  pcl::toROSMsg(*table_cloud, table_cloud_ros);
121  table_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
122  table_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
123  table_pub.publish(table_cloud_ros);
124 
125  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr object_on_table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
126  seg->getObjectsOnTable(object_on_table_cloud);
127  std::cout<<"Size of cloud on table: "<<object_on_table_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
128  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 object_cloud_ros;
129  pcl::toROSMsg(*object_on_table_cloud, object_cloud_ros);
130  object_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
131  object_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
132  object_on_table_pub.publish(object_cloud_ros);
133 
134  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr object_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
135  seg->getObjectsCloud(object_cloud);
136  std::cout<<"Size of segmented objects cloud: "<<object_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
137  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 objects_cloud_ros;
138  pcl::toROSMsg(*object_cloud, objects_cloud_ros);
139  objects_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
140  objects_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
141  object_pub.publish(objects_cloud_ros);
142 
143  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr projected_cloud_pcl(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
144  projectToZ(object_cloud, projected_cloud_pcl );
145  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 projected_cloud_ros;
146  pcl::toROSMsg(*projected_cloud_pcl, projected_cloud_ros);
147  projected_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
148  projected_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
149  projected_pub.publish(projected_cloud_ros);
150 
151 
152  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr hull_cloud_pcl(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
153  getConvexHull(projected_cloud_pcl , hull_cloud_pcl );
154  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 hull_cloud_ros;
155  pcl::toROSMsg(*hull_cloud_pcl, hull_cloud_ros);
156  hull_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
157  hull_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
158  hull_pub.publish(hull_cloud_ros);
159 
160 
161 
162  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 filtered_cloud_ros;
163  pcl::toROSMsg(*filtered_cloud_pcl, filtered_cloud_ros);
164  filtered_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
165  filtered_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
166  filter_pub.publish(filtered_cloud_ros);
167 
168  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> objects;
169  seg->getObjects(objects);
170  std::cout<<"Detected objects: "<<objects.size()<<std::endl;
171

173 }

175 int main(int argc, char **argv)
176 {
177  ros::init(argc, argv, "segmentation_test");
178  ros::NodeHandle nh;
179 
180  //after cloud_filter_node is running
181  //ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("/cloud_filter_node/cloud_filtered",1,cloud_cb);
182  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("kinect2/sd/points",1,cloud_cb);
183  table_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("table_cloud",10);
184  object_on_table_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("object",10);
185  object_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("objects",10);
186  filter_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("filtered_cloud",10);
187  hull_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("convex_hull",10);
188  projected_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("projected_cloud",10);
189  ros::spin();
190 
191 }
